value.name: Laws broken during search for suspect Jerry Vue?
value.description: Nobody whose home was searched that night signed for Jerry Vue's bond. The law says bounty hunters don't need a search warrant like police do. They do need something called "reasonable cause ...

value.name: U.S. Marshal: Fresno shooting suspect good at not being caught
value.description: They issued a statement saying: "We were shocked to hear the news of our former employee Jerry Vue he was always polite, helpful and courteous with his peers. We are saddened by his tragic loss ...
